      • getInstance

        public static LogWindowHandler getInstance(java.lang.String pTitle)
        Returns a log window handler for a given title. if it does not exist it is created.
        Parameters:
        pTitle - log window title
        Returns:
        log window handler

      • getInstance

        public static LogWindowHandler getInstance(java.lang.String pTitle,
                                           int pWidth,
                                           int pHeight)
        Returns a log window handler for a given title and window dimensions. if it does not exist it is created.
        Parameters:
        pTitle - log window title
        pWidth - window width
        pHeight - window height
        Returns:
        log window handler
